```{r}
library(openxlsx)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape2)
options(java.parameters = "-Xmx1000m")
```

```{r}
x <- read.xlsx("C:/Users/HardwareX/Downloads/20210324 Listado de Inmuebles y financiamiento.xlsx")
y <- x %>% select(C贸digo.Inmueble,TipoDoc,MontoUF)
Tipo.Pago <- x %>% group_by(TipoDoc) %>% count()
```

```{r}
z1 <- x %>% group_by(C贸digo.Inmueble) %>% mutate("TipoDOCCONC" = paste0(TipoDoc, collapse = "-")) %>% mutate("Monto" = paste0(MontoUF, collapse = "-"))
```

```{r}
z2 <- reshape2::dcast(y, C贸digo.Inmueble ~ TipoDoc, value.var = "MontoUF", fill = "0")
```

```{r}
Final <- merge(z1,z2, by = "C贸digo.Inmueble")
```

```{r}
write.xlsx(Final, file = "TablaJavi.xlsx")
```
